entry.title: New review on Macrophages in Nature Reviews Immunology

link.title: New review on Macrophages in Nature Reviews Immunology

entry.content:
A review by Jacques just got published at Nature Reviews Immunology. This comprehensive review offers a powerful “handbook” of immune cell behaviour, spotlighting macrophages as key culprits driving fibrosis. He coauthored this review with Prof. Enrico Petretto, another PI at Duke-NUS.

Check out the review! - The spatial and temporal activation of macrophages during fibrosis
entry.summary: A review by Jacques just got published at Nature Reviews Immunology. This comprehensive review offers a powerful “handbook” of immune cell behaviour, spotlighting macrophages as key culprits driving fibrosis. He coauthored this review with Prof. Enrico Petretto, another PI at Duke-NUS.

entry.title: Xiaoting was selected to present at SgSI 2025!

link.title: Xiaoting was selected to present at SgSI 2025!

entry.content:
Recently, one of our new joiners, Xiaoting, was selected to give a talk at the Singapore Society for Immunology 2025 Symposium. It was held from 28-30th May at the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine (Novena Campus) in Singapore.

Well done, Xiaoting!
entry.summary: Recently, one of our new joiners, Xiaoting, was selected to give a talk at the Singapore Society for Immunology 2025 Symposium. It was held from 28-30th May at the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine (Novena Campus) in Singapore.
